amount.description: An exact amount to deliver to the recipient. If the counterparty is not specified, amounts with any counterparty may be used. (This field is exclusive with destination.minAmount).

amountInfo.description: (Optional) A message explaining the 'amount' field. When present, the 'amount' was set to 0 XRP to prevent misuse when processing a partial payment. See: https://developers.ripple.com/partial-payments.html
